column4: I use now ubuntu 11.04 and I wonder if I upgrade to 11.10, will I have the crappy version of gnome that a lot of people hate?
that's probably unity what you mean ;-) And well, you can kinda switch to real GNOME if you ilke.
I want my actual gnome won't be destroy...
I just want a smooth upgrade... because I need some app new versions now...  But I fear "this" dist-upgrade... about losing all my gnome config and actual look and feel
